purpose: Provide a curated list of open-source GitHub repositories related to ChatGPT and OpenAI API for easy access and exploration.
principle: Aggregates and organizes repositories into a comprehensive list, categorized by their relevance to ChatGPT and OpenAI's API usage.
reusability: The list can be used by developers and researchers to discover and explore relevant projects, encouraging collaboration and innovation in the field.
limitations: The list relies on community contributions and may not cover all available repositories or stay up-to-date with the latest developments.
name: awesome-ChatGPT-repositories
description: A curated list of resources dedicated to open source GitHub repositories related to ChatGPT and OpenAI API
highlight: Comprehensive collection of GitHub repositories focused on ChatGPT and OpenAI API, serving as a valuable resource for developers and researchers.
